duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, plan, and oversee the construction and maintenance of buildings and other structures.
Work with other unit members on multi-disciplinary design teams in support of capital improvement projects.
Perform design reviews, code analysis, etc. that construct or upgrade facilities and site infrastructure through the design phase.
Procurement phase, and execution (e.g., construction support/oversight and commissioning of buildings and/or systems).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Architecture degree from an accredited college or university and more than five years of experience.
